tns:Object.name: META
tns:Object.tns:sql: CREATE TABLE META (VERSION INT NOT NULL)

tns:Object.name: TABLESPACES
tns:Object.tns:sql: CREATE TABLE TABLESPACES ( SPACE_ID int NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY (START WITH 1, INCREMENT BY 1), SPACE_NAME VARCHAR(128) NOT NULL CONSTRAINT SPACE_UNIQUE UNIQUE, SPACE_HANDLER VARCHAR (1024) DEFAULT 'HDFS', SPACE_URI VARCHAR (4096) NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT C_SPACE_PK PRIMARY KEY (SPACE_ID) )

tns:Object.name: DATABASES_
tns:Object.tns:sql: CREATE TABLE DATABASES_ ( DB_ID int NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY (START WITH 1, INCREMENT BY 1), DB_NAME VARCHAR(128) NOT NULL CONSTRAINT DB_NAME_UNIQ UNIQUE, SPACE_ID INT NOT NULL REFERENCES TABLESPACES (SPACE_ID), CONSTRAINT DATABASES_PK PRIMARY KEY (DB_ID) )

tns:Object.name: IDX_DATABASE_DB_ID
tns:Object.tns:sql: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX idx_database_db_id on DATABASES_ (DB_ID)

tns:Object.name: TABLES
tns:Object.tns:sql: CREATE TABLE TABLES ( TID int NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY (START WITH 1, INCREMENT BY 1), DB_ID int NOT NULL REFERENCES DATABASES_ (DB_ID), TABLE_NAME VARCHAR(128) NOT NULL, TABLE_TYPE VARCHAR(128) NOT NULL, PATH VARCHAR(4096), STORE_TYPE CHAR(16), CONSTRAINT TABLES_PK PRIMARY KEY (TID), CONSTRAINT C_TABLE_ID_UNIQ UNIQUE (DB_ID, TABLE_NAME) )

tns:Object.name: IDX_TABLES_TID
tns:Object.tns:sql: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX idx_tables_tid on TABLES (TID)

tns:Object.name: IDX_TABLES_NAME
tns:Object.tns:sql: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX idx_tables_name on TABLES (DB_ID, TABLE_NAME)

tns:Object.name: COLUMNS
tns:Object.tns:sql: CREATE TABLE COLUMNS ( TID INT NOT NULL REFERENCES TABLES (TID) ON DELETE CASCADE, COLUMN_NAME VARCHAR(128) NOT NULL, ORDINAL_POSITION INTEGER NOT NULL, DATA_TYPE CHAR(16), TYPE_LENGTH INTEGER, CONSTRAINT COLUMNS_PK PRIMARY KEY (TID, COLUMN_NAME) )

tns:Object.name: IDX_FK_COLUMNS_TABLE_NAME
tns:Object.tns:sql: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX idx_fk_columns_table_name on COLUMNS (TID, COLUMN_NAME)

tns:Object.name: OPTIONS
tns:Object.tns:sql: CREATE TABLE OPTIONS ( TID INT NOT NULL REFERENCES TABLES (TID) ON DELETE CASCADE, KEY_ VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, VALUE_ VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT C_OPTIONS_UNIQUE UNIQUE (TID, KEY_, VALUE_) )

tns:Object.name: IDX_OPTIONS_KEY
tns:Object.tns:sql: CREATE INDEX idx_options_key on OPTIONS (TID)

tns:Object.name: INDEXES
tns:Object.tns:sql: CREATE TABLE INDEXES ( DB_ID INT NOT NULL REFERENCES DATABASES_ (DB_ID) ON DELETE CASCADE, TID INT NOT NULL REFERENCES TABLES (TID) ON DELETE CASCADE, INDEX_NAME VARCHAR(128) NOT NULL, COLUMN_NAME VARCHAR(128) NOT NULL, DATA_TYPE VARCHAR(128) NOT NULL, INDEX_TYPE CHAR(32) NOT NULL, IS_UNIQUE BOOLEAN NOT NULL, IS_CLUSTERED BOOLEAN NOT NULL, IS_ASCENDING BOOLEAN NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT C_INDEXES_PK PRIMARY KEY (DB_ID, INDEX_NAME) )

tns:Object.name: IDX_INDEXES_PK
tns:Object.tns:sql: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX idx_indexes_pk ON INDEXES (DB_ID,index_name)

tns:Object.name: IDX_INDEXES_COLUMNS
tns:Object.tns:sql: CREATE INDEX idx_indexes_columns ON INDEXES (DB_ID,column_name)

tns:Object.name: STATS
tns:Object.tns:sql: CREATE TABLE STATS ( TID INT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, NUM_ROWS BIGINT, NUM_BYTES BIGINT, FOREIGN KEY (TID) REFERENCES TABLES (TID) ON DELETE CASCADE )

tns:Object.name: IDX_STATS_TABLE_NAME
tns:Object.tns:sql: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX IDX_STATS_TABLE_NAME ON STATS (TID)

tns:Object.name: PARTITION_METHODS
tns:Object.tns:sql: CREATE TABLE PARTITION_METHODS ( TID INT NOT NULL REFERENCES TABLES (TID) ON DELETE CASCADE, PARTITION_TYPE VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, EXPRESSION VARCHAR(1024) NOT NULL, EXPRESSION_SCHEMA VARCHAR(1024) FOR BIT DATA NOT NULL )

tns:Object.name: IDX_PARTITION_METHODS_TABLE_ID
tns:Object.tns:sql: CREATE INDEX idx_partition_methods_table_id ON PARTITION_METHODS (TID)

tns:Object.name: TABLESPACES_HIST
tns:Object.tns:sql: CREATE TABLE TABLESPACES_HIST ( SPACE_HIST_ID int NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY (START WITH 1, INCREMENT BY 1), SPACE_NAME VARCHAR(128) NOT NULL CONSTRAINT SPACE_HIST_UNIQUE UNIQUE, SPACE_HANDLER VARCHAR (1024) DEFAULT 'HDFS', SPACE_URI VARCHAR (4096) NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT C_SPACE_HIST_PK PRIMARY KEY (SPACE_HIST_ID) )

tns:Object.name: TABLESPACES_HIST_TRG
tns:Object.tns:sql: CREATE TRIGGER TABLESPACES_HIST_TRG AFTER INSERT ON TABLESPACES REFERENCING NEW AS NEWROW FOR EACH ROW INSERT INTO TABLESPACES_HIST (SPACE_NAME, SPACE_URI) VALUES (NEWROW.SPACE_NAME, NEWROW.SPACE_URI)

tns:existQuery.tns:sql: select a.TRIGGERNAME from SYS.SYSTRIGGERS a inner join SYS.SYSSCHEMAS b on a.SCHEMAID = b.SCHEMAID where b.SCHEMANAME = ?
select a.SEQUENCENAME from SYS.SYSSEQUENCES a inner join SYS.SYSSCHEMAS b on a.SCHEMAID = b.SCHEMAID where b.SCHEMANAME = ?
select a.TABLENAME from SYS.SYSTABLES a inner join SYS.SYSSCHEMAS b on a.SCHEMAID = b.SCHEMAID where b.SCHEMANAME = ? and a.TABLETYPE = 'V'
